video_title: How to meet anyone you want

content_profile.title: How to meet anyone you want

key_takeaways: Solution: Research-based value-first cold outreach (Difficulty: intermediate)
Growth Tactic: Cold DMs on Twitter and email with research-based personalization (Channel: content)
Strategy: Cold outreach networking by researching targets and providing genuine value
Startup Opportunity: Reverse Brian Johnson concept - service to increase age markers instead of decreasing them (Target: people who want to age faster)
